mapper.select: /* 조직도 소분류 에이작스 활용 뿌리기 */ SELECT os.organization_code_S AS organizationCodeS ,os.cp_representative_code AS cpRepresentativeCode ,os.super_admin_id AS superAdminId ,os.organization_code_L AS organizationCodeL ,os.organization_code_M AS organizationCodeM ,os.organization_name_L AS organizationNameL ,os.organization_name_M AS organizationNameM ,os.organization_name_S AS organizationNameS ,os.cp_name AS cpName ,os.reg_date AS regDate FROM tb_organization_s AS os WHERE os.organization_name_M = #{organiM};

/* 조직도 중분류 에이작스 활용 뿌리기 */ SELECT om.organization_code_M AS organizationCodeM ,om.cp_representative_code AS cpRepresentativeCode ,om.super_admin_id AS superAdminId ,om.organization_code_L AS organizationCodeL ,om.organization_name_L AS organizationNameL ,om.organization_name_M AS organizationNameM ,om.cp_name AS cpName ,om.reg_date AS regDate FROM tb_organization_m AS om WHERE om.organization_name_L = #{organiL};

/* 조직도 대분류 뿌리기 */ SELECT ol.organization_code_L AS organizationCodeL ,ol.cp_representative_code AS cpRepresentativeCode ,ol.super_admin_id AS superAdminId ,ol.organization_name_L AS organizationNameL ,ol.cp_name AS cpName ,ol.reg_date AS regDate FROM tb_organization_l AS ol;

/* 어드민 정보 조회 */ SELECT ta.super_admin_id , ta.cp_representative_code , ta.super_admin_pw , ta.cp_domain , ta.specified_domain_address , ta.reg_date , cr.cp_deposit_status_code , cr.cp_uniquemply_number , cr.cp_name , cr.cp_representativemply_name , cr.cp_tel , cr.cp_registration_number , cr.cp_addr , cr.super_sw_manager , cr.reg_date FROM tb_super_admin AS ta INNER join tb_cp_representative AS cr on ta.cp_representative_code = cr.cp_representative_code WHERE ta.super_admin_id = #{superAdminId};

/* 사원전체 정보 조회 */ SELECT t.emply_id as emplyId , t.organization_code_S as organizationCodeS , t.rank_level_code as rankLevelCode , t.position_level_code as positionLevelCode , t.cp_representative_code as cpRepresentativeCode , t.super_admin_id as superAdminId , t.emply_pw as emplyPw , t.emply_number as emplyNumber , t.emply_name as emplyName , t.emply_birth as emplyBirth , t.emply_account as emplyAccount , t.emply_home_address as emplyHomeAddress , t.emplyment_date as emplymentDate , t.emplyment_type as emplymentType , t.retire_status as retireStatus , t.cp_name as cpName , t.reg_date as regDate FROM tb_emply_info_reg as t

SELECT reg.emply_id , reg.organization_code_S , reg.rank_level_code , reg.position_level_code , reg.emply_pw , reg.emply_number , reg.emply_name , reg.emply_birth , reg.emply_account , reg.emply_home_address , reg.emply_home_address_zip , reg.emply_home_address_detail , reg.emplyment_date , reg.emplyment_type , reg.retire_status , rl.rank_level , rl.rank_name , pl.position_level , pl.position_name , os.organization_code_L , os.organization_code_M , os.organization_name_L , os.organization_name_M , os.organization_name_S FROM tb_emply_info_reg AS reg INNER join tb_rank_level AS rl on reg.rank_level_code = rl.rank_level_code INNER join tb_position_level AS pl on reg.position_level_code = pl.position_level_code INNER join tb_organization_s AS os on reg.organization_code_S = os.organization_code_S WHERE reg.emply_id = #{emplyId};
